item.title: LU
item.description: score:168 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd is a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China, which indicates strong market potential. The company’s technology-empowered personal financial services platform offers personal lending and wealth management solutions, tapping into the growing demand for personal finance services in China.

item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:343 Chances: TG Therapeutics, Inc. has entered into an agreement to acquire a worldwide license to Precision BioSciences, Inc.’s Azercabtagene Zapreleucel (azer-cel), an allogeneic CD19 CAR T cell therapy program for autoimmune diseases. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.
